Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.persistency

Class Persistency

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.persistency.Persistency
public class Persistency extends Object
This class handles the persistence of the game state, allowing loading and saving of games.

  • Method Details

    • loadGame

      public Tile[][] loadGame(File fileName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads game from a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file containing the game state.
      Returns:
      A 2D array representing the game board with tiles and items.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the specified file is not found.
